text: suryan udikkumpeal atavarute guhavitt valatubhagattekk marippeakunnatayum, at astamikkumpeal atavare vitt katann itat bhagattekk peakunnatayum ninakk kanam. avarakatte atinre (guhayute) visalamaya oru bhagattakunnu. at allahuvinre drstantannalil pettatatre. allahu are nervaliyilakkunnuvea avanan sanmargam prapiccavan. avan are durmargattilakkunnuvea avane nervaliyilekk nayikkunna oru raksadhikariyeyum ni kantettunnatalla tanne
